Text: Hi, Nepotu, it is great that you upload 2012 playoffs for us, but I hope you still have some old games to share with guys like me!
Hi, my friend, ivo! Yes, I have some old games but now I'm involved in these future old games :) which is the playoffs 2012. After the Finals will come back with some goodies! Cheers bro!
Thanks mate, I have watched bulls-76ers (game 4) lately, but still - there is no magic in NBA these days! Thank you for you work and wait to see some more!
